name: Paradox (itch) (shreks7)
description:
Objective:

Collect 10 coins to win.

How to play?

  • Add/Remove boxes  to the elevator to move them up or down. Push the blue button to start the elevator.
  • Balance the boxes to stop the left elevator at the collection spot (next to the guy).
  • You earn a coin whenever you are able to stop the left elevator at the collection spot. You lose a coin if weights are not balanced.
  • Hint - 1 box on the left is not equal to 1 on the  right.
